titleStmt.title: The life of the apostle St Paul, written in French by the famous Bishop of Grasse, and now Englished by a person of honour.
titleStmt.author: Godeau, Antoine, 1605-1672.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by James Young for Henry Twyford, and are to be sold at his shop in Vine Court, Middle Temple.,

notesStmt.note: "The famous Bishop of Grasse" = Antoine Godeau; "A Person of Honour" = Edward, Lord Vaux.
With engraved frontispiece representing St. Paul.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
